# MicroLIA-Simulate

**MicroLIA-Simulate** is an open-source simulation package for generating synthetic astronomical datasets. It is designed as the lightweight sister package to the **MicroLIA** framework.

# Installation

MicroLIA-Simulate requires Python 3.12+, and can be installed via pip:

```
    $ pip install MicroLIA-Simulate
```

# Documentation

For technical details, check out the Documentation.
